entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:13 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 10:44 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 90 %

Dewpoint: -6.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
